metadata.Title: CVE-2013-4090 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Varnish HTTP cache before 3.0.4: ACL bug

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-4090` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvarnishapi1 - 3.0.5-2ubuntu0.1
varnish - 3.0.5-2ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: varnish package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.5-2ubuntu0.1').
